aWFRuleDesc.Name: Get List Of GBP To Update

aEDA_ActionLogCreationActivityDescBasedO.Reason: Need Update Due To New Mandatory Product/Coverage Version

aEDA_ActionLogEventDesc.Name: Update Needed Due To Mandatory Product/Coverage Version __ GBP

aEDA_ActionLogCreationActivityDescBasedO.Name: Identify GBP To Update After Mandatory Version

aWFRuleDesc.RuleText:
; aWF_RT_Formule (aEDA_SubscribedActivityRuleEngine) (Def Version:2) (Implem Version:1)
uses aWLIGBPModelIndividualProduct, aEDA_ActionLogEvent, aEDA_Event
function GBPModel return aWLIGBPModelIndividualProduct if self.Master <> Nil return aWLIGBPModelIndividualProduct(self.Master.OnObject) else return aWLIGBPModelIndividualProduct(self.OnObject) endIf endFunc
function Event return aEDA_ActionLogEvent override var curEvent : aEDA_Event
if self.Master <> Nil return aEDA_ActionLogEvent(self.Master.Event) else curEvent = inherited self.Event return aEDA_ActionLogEvent(curEvent) endIf endFunc
procedure WFCalculate(inOut Result : Boolean) Result = self.GBPModel.IsOrConatinNewActiveMandatoryOfferedEntity endProc
aWFRuleDesc.Name: Only If New Mandatory Version

aEDA_SubscribedActivity.Name: Request GBP Update after Activation of Mandatroy Version
